EmailTemplate.name: Program follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Program follow-up - {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c}
Hope the workshop went well.
Just a couple of things to tidy up.
Were there any changes to the participants? Attached is the pax list as I last had it
Do you want me to send a reminder to participants re their 2nd 2 days? If yes, is there anything in particular you want me to say to them? What time do you want them to start?
Please send me your invoice when ready – your fees for this workshop are: Presenter PROF_FEE x XX% = $XXX Marketing x XX% = $XXX Materials commission MAT_FEE x XX% = $XXX Plus GST Plus Expenses (please list if they’re GST inclusive or exclusive). Remember to include your receipts If we’re paying you in a different currency then above, please advise exchange rate used on invoice
Peer/Self review - please complete the attached ENSI Peer/Self Review form and return to me. (Solo facilitators will complete a self-assessment and dual facilitators will peer review each other)
Thanks
